actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution to impose a moratorium on the reorganization of the Salt Lake City Internal Revenue Service District Office.

summary.text: States that the Commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service should not implement the proposed reorganization of the Salt Lake City Internal Revenue Service District Office until the appropriate committees of Congress have had an opportunity to hold hearings on the proposal.

titles.title: A resolution to impose a moratorium on the reorganization of the Salt Lake City Internal Revenue Service District Office.
